summary: Makes the Staff of Magnus worthy for an archmage.
descriptionHtml:
Requested mod to match my other mod:
Better Archmage\'s Robes - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4427


---DESCRIPTION---
This mod improves the enchantments of the Staff of Magnus to be worthy of an Archmage.

Vanilla - Absorb 20 magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.
Main - Absorb 75 magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.
Medium - Absorb 50 magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.


---INSTALL---
Use mod manger or place contents into Data directory.

---UNISTALL---
Remove files from Data directory.

---UPDATE---
*As requested have uploaded medium version.
     -Medium - Absorb 50 magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.
* Fixed duplicate .esp with medium version.
author: Savage Hammer
